===Etymology===
From "Gongsun Chou II", in ''[[w:Mencius (book)|Mencius]]'' ({{lang|zh|《孟子·公孫丑下》}}):
: {{zh-x|得道 者 多 助，失道 者 寡 助。|He who finds the proper course has many to assist him. He who loses the proper course has few to assist him.}}
